svg.title: Average delivered price of India's imported coal
svg.desc: Created by Robbie Andrew (@robbie_andrew), CICERO Center for International Climate Research. CC-BY: Material may be freely re-used as long as you credit the author

g.text: Average delivered price of India's imported coal
Calculated as value/quantity from trade statistics
Prices follow not only market swings, but also the different types of coal imported by India

div.p: CC-BY: Material may be freely re-used as long as you credit the author
